extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to manage multiple tabs at a time.

bookmarkTabs_notification_message.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked in a new folder under "$PARENT$.

notPermitted_allUrls_message.message: Failed to get permissions to access contents of webpages. Please grant permissions via the configurations of Multiple Tab Handler.

notPermitted_bookmarks_message.message: Failed to get permissions to create bookmarks. Please grant permissions via the configurations of Multiple Tab Handler.

notPermitted_clipboardWrite_message.message: Failed to get permissions to write data to the clipboard. Please grant permissions via the configurations of Multiple Tab Handler.

panelCaptionBottom.message: And Click Here to Choose Action

panelDisabledBy_treestyletab.message: Select and Do panel is disabled, instead please see vertical tab bar in the sidebar provided by Tree Style Tab. You can select tabs by dragging (you need to start the drag action with a long press over 0.5sec). Moreover, Ctrl-Click toggles selection and Shift-Click selects tabs between the clicked and the active.

message_updatedFromLegacy_description.message: Multiple Tab Handler is now reborn based on WebExtensions technologies for Firefox 57 and later. Now you can select tabs and do something command from the "Select and Do" toolbar button. Moreover, this addon is compatible to Tree Style Tab another addon. You'll select tabs in in the TST's sidebar, by long-press (about 0.5sec).

message_newFeatures_description.message:
Multiple Tab Handler is an addon providing ability to select multiple tabs by dragging action. This no longer provides special commands for selected tabs, instead please install other addons working with selected tabs. For example:

  • Copy Selected Tabs to Clipboard: copies information of selected tabs to the clipboard.
  • Save Selected Tabs to Files: downloads contents of selected tabs to local files.
  • Tab Mover: moves selected tabs to other windows.

config_panelSize_description.message: *You can use any CSS length value.

config_fontSize_description.message: *You can use any CSS font-size value.

config_applyThemeColorToIcon_label.message: Apply theme color to the toolbar button (*You need to set "svg.context-properties.content.enabled" to "true" via "about:config" on Firefox 62 or later)

config_dragSelection_caption.message: Tab Selection from dragging after long-press

config_autoOpenMenuOnDragEnd_label.message: Open menu automatically after tabs are selected

config_copyToClipboardFormats_restoreDef.message: Restore default formats keeping added formats

config_copyToClipboardFormats_placeholde.message:
Available place holders for formats:
%URL%=Page URL,
%TITLE%=Page Title,
%AUTHOR%=Author name (specified by META),
%DESCRIPTION%=Description (specified by META),
%KEYWORDS%=Search keywords (specified by META),
%URL_HTMLIFIED%=URL escaped for HTML,
%TITLE_HTMLIFIED%=Title escaped for HTML,
%AUTHOR_HTMLIFIED%=Author name escaped for HTML,
%DESCRIPTION_HTMLIFIED%=Description escaped for HTML,
%KEYWORDS_HTMLIFIED%=Search keywords escaped for HTML,
%TST_INDENT(indenter)%, %TST_INDENT(indenter1)(indenter2)...(indenterN)%=Indent (powered by Tree Style Tab)
%TAB%=Tab,
%EOL%=Line Feed,
%RT%=Copy as a rich text (Note: this placeholder itself is cleared from the copied text)

config_saveTabsPrefix_description.message: *Path under the download folder. "/" will be recognized as a path delimiter.

config_permissions_fallbackToToolbarButt.message: Click the "Select and Do" toolbar button
Due to Firefox's bug, you cannot request permission from this screen. Please click the "Select and Do" toolbar button to grant permissions.

config_clearSelectionAfterCommandInvoked.message: Clear selection after a command is invoked

config_disablePanelWhenAlternativeTabBar.message: Disable panel when any alternative tab bar is available
